scripts.build: npm run build:version && npm run build:auth0-config && npm run bump:sw && npm run build:min-js && npm run stage:netlify && npm run verify:publish-root
scripts.prebuild: node tools/verify-auth0-production.mjs && node tools/guard-netlify-context.mjs && node scripts/generate-auth0-config.mjs && node tools/verify-functions-no-import-meta.mjs && npm run guard:secrets && npm run guard:html
scripts.lh:mobile: mkdir -p ./reports/lighthouse && CHROME_BIN=$(command -v google-chrome-stable || command -v google-chrome || command -v chromium-browser || command -v chromium || true) && CHROME_PATH=${CHROME_PATH:-$CHROME_BIN} lighthouse http://127.0.0.1:4173 --form-factor=mobile --only-categories=performance,best-practices,accessibility,seo --output=json --output-path=${LH_OUTPUT_PATH:-./reports/lighthouse/mobile.json} --chrome-flags="--headless=new --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage --disable-gpu --remote-debugging-port=0" --max-wait-for-load=45000 --throttling-method=provided --no-enable-error-reporting
scripts.lh:desktop: mkdir -p ./reports/lighthouse && CHROME_BIN=$(command -v google-chrome-stable || command -v google-chrome || command -v chromium-browser || command -v chromium || true) && CHROME_PATH=${CHROME_PATH:-$CHROME_BIN} lighthouse http://127.0.0.1:4173 --preset=desktop --only-categories=performance,best-practices,accessibility,seo --output=json --output-path=${LH_OUTPUT_PATH:-./reports/lighthouse/desktop.json} --chrome-flags="--headless=new --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage --disable-gpu --remote-debugging-port=0" --max-wait-for-load=45000 --throttling-method=provided --no-enable-error-reporting
scripts.test:lh:mobile: mkdir -p ./docs/lighthouse && CHROME_BIN=$(command -v google-chrome-stable || command -v google-chrome || command -v chromium-browser || command -v chromium || true) && CHROME_PATH=${CHROME_PATH:-$CHROME_BIN} lighthouse "${LHCI_URL:-http://127.0.0.1:4173}" --form-factor=mobile --screenEmulation.mobile=true --only-categories=performance,accessibility,best-practices,seo --throttling-method=provided --throttling.rttMs=0 --throttling.requestLatencyMs=0 --throttling.downloadThroughputKbps=0 --throttling.uploadThroughputKbps=0 --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=1 --max-wait-for-load=90000 --chrome-flags="--headless=new --no-sandbox --disable-gpu --disable-dev-shm-usage --ignore-certificate-errors" --output=json --output-path=./docs/lighthouse/latest-mobile.json
scripts.test:super: npm run build && npm run test:html && npm run test:links && npm run test:charset && npm run test:importmap && npm run test:lh:mobile && npm run test:lh:enforce
scripts.verify:build-and-tests: npm run clean --if-present && npm ci && npm run build && npm run lint --if-present && npm run typecheck --if-present && npm run test --if-present && npm run test:integration --if-present && npm run test:exports --if-present && npm run test:e2e --if-present && npm run perf:bundle --if-present
scripts.verify:perf: npm run build && npm run test:lh
scripts.verify:deploy: npm run verify:build-and-tests && npm run verify:perf
